channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 08:23 Air alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Citizen for Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 08:23 Air alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Citizen for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 07:21 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovsk district- Dnipro rayon- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganese territorial community and Nikopol.
item.description: 🟡 07:21 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovsk district- Dnipro rayon- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganese territorial community and Nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
